sentences.english: Two of the Dragons were lying, bathing in their blood and covered with their own entrails .
sentences.chinese: 两只巨龙在自己的血泊和内脏堆中躺下了。

sentences.english: He saw Paris' body drenched in blood.
sentences.chinese: 他看到巴利斯的尸体躺在血泊中。

sentences.english: She picks up back to jilt to go out of wrap, but the husband lie at pool of blood amid.
sentences.chinese: 她捡回了甩出去的包，而丈夫却躺在了血泊中。

sentences.english: Absolutely cannot think of, lin Manli falls in pool of blood.
sentences.chinese: 万万没想到，林曼莉倒在血泊中。

sentences.english: The Commune was being drowned in its own blood.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎公社被淹没在自己的血泊之中。

sentences.english: The deer was, as you know, sanguis, in blood;
sentences.chinese: 那头鹿，您知道，沐浴于血泊之中。

sentences.english: By the time someone came along he had drowned in his own blood.
sentences.chinese: 等到有人发现时，他已经死在了血泊之中。

sentences.english: Here friend by friend in bloody channel lies.
sentences.chinese: 朋友偎靠着朋友，都在血泊中横躺。

sentences.english: Burned into its surface is the text: "Maximilien Bourdaloue on January 21st, dipped his handkerchief in the blood of Louis XVI after his beheading."
sentences.chinese: 把他的手帕浸在了斩首后的路易十六的血泊之中。

sentences.english: After the battle, the whole field was weltering in blood.
sentences.chinese: 战役打完后，整个战场浸于血泊之中。

sentences.english: One of the girls, left lying in a pool of her own blood, died.
sentences.chinese: 一个女孩，无助地躺在血泊中，死了。

sentences.english: I ran there and saw him lying in a pool of blood.
sentences.chinese: 我跑到那儿，看见他躺在血泊中。

definition: to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
